target.name: help
target.echo:
To run this script in Eclipse: Run As > Ant Build
To run this script via commandline (build default modules + run tests, then collect test results and build per-component + overall update site zips): cd /path/to/checked/out/source/tree; ant
or, to build everything but not *run* the tests: ant -DMAVEN_FLAGS="clean install -Dmaven.test.skip" or ant -Dnotests=true
or, to purge the local repo (or purge then build): ant purge -q or ant clean-run
or, to rebuild even if sources have not changed: ant -Dbuild.if.sources.unchanged=true
or, to fetch fresh sources, then build anew: ant -Dclean.sources=true
or, to (re-)run tests w/o (re-)building first: ant -DMAVEN_FLAGS="osgi-test:test -B -fn"
or, to re-build a single component's update site w/o building, testing, and installing it into the m2 repo: ant create.update.site
or, to re-build the overall update site w/o building first (no applicable when COMPONENTS=.): ant create.overall.update.site -Dbuild.if.sources.unchanged=true
To have hudson manage sources (rather than having this script checkout/update them) use: -Dhudson.managed.sources=true
Note: if tests stall on Linux, install Xvfb and this script will use that to run Maven, unless use: -DnoXvfb=true
Here is the order in which components must be built:

target.name: clean-run
target.description: purge m2 repo, then run build

target.name: run
target.description: run a build, collect test results, generate overall update site

target.name: test
target.description: run tests w/o first getting sources + list of components to build; assumes an upstream build job was already run

then.fail: Error! Build cannot proceed! Must install svnant.jar, svnkit.jar + svnClientAdapter.jar from ${SVNANT_MIRROR}/svnant-1.3.0.zip into ${COMMON_TOOLS}/.

else.echo: Warning! Svnant unavailable. Will use Maven to fetch sources.

target.name: get.sources
target.description: if sources not already on disk, fetch them

then.echo: All components up to date: nothing to do! To force a build of unchanged components, use -Dbuild.if.sources.unchanged=true

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> <testsuite failures="0" time="0.001" errors="0" skipped="0" tests="1" name="org.jboss.tools.NoTestsRun"> <testcase time="0.001" classname="org.jboss.tools.NoTestsRun" name="NoTestsRun"/> </testsuite>
The following components' sources have changed and will be built: COMPONENTS.to.build = ${COMPONENTS.to.build}

#!/bin/bash if [[ -f /tmp/.X3-lock ]]; then kill -9 `cat /tmp/.X3-lock` rm -fr /tmp/.X3-lock fi /usr/bin/Xvfb :3 -ac 2>&1 1>/dev/null & DISPLAY=:3 /opt/maven3/bin/mvn $* kill -9 `cat /tmp/.X3-lock` rm -fr /tmp/.X3-lock
All components up to date: nothing to do! To force a build of unchanged components, use -Dbuild.if.sources.unchanged=true

then.fail: Overall update site zip contains no features!

else.echo: Update site zip for ${COMPONENTS.to.build} contains no features!

target.name: genSiteXml
target.description: Generate a site.xml to contain the features in a category
target.echo: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <site> <description>To install these features, point Eclipse at this site.</description> <!-- ${category.name} --> <category-def label="${category.name}" name="${category.name}"> <description>${category.name}: contains all features in this build.</description> </category-def>

then.echo: bin.includes = feature.*, ., plugin.*, about.*, META-INF/, .options/, lib/, help/, icons/, org/, src/

else.fail: ERROR! Cannot deploy - please install scp or rsync on this server and try again.
